instructions:
Turn on oven light to warm oven and close door. Cream margarine and sugar. Add egg yolks and vanilla
and beat until creamy. Mix in the flour. Put 1/6 of the dough in an icing bag, seal and place in the warm
oven. Hand press the remaining dough into a 9 x 13 baking pan. Warm apricot preserves and spread on
dough, then sprinkle with chopped walnuts. Cover with lattice by piping warmed dough through
the icing bag. There should be enough dough to pipe around the edges and make 5 long stripes and 7 short
stripes.
Bake for 35 to 40 minutes in a 350 F oven. Test with a knife to see if done. Cool, lightly dust with
confectioner’s sugar, and cut into bars. 
*(Rev. 11/15/91)*
name: Apricot Bars
creator: Tony Decker
